verses.verse: אַחֲרֵ֨י <WH310> After הַדְּבָרִ֤ים <WH1697> these things וְהָאֱמֶת֙ <WH571> and the establishment הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these בָּ֖א <WH935> came סַנְחֵרִ֣יב <WH5576> thereof Sennacherib מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king אַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> of Assyria וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> and entered בִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> into Judah וַיִּ֙חַן֙ <WH2583> and encamped עַל־ <WH5921> and הֶעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> cities הַבְּצֻר֔וֹת <WH1219> against the fenced וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and thought לְבִקְעָ֥ם <WH1234> to win אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> about

וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> saw יְחִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah כִּי־ <WH3588> for בָ֖א <WH935> was come סַנְחֵרִ֑יב <WH5576> that Sennacherib וּפָנָ֕יו <WH6440> and that he was purposed לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> to fight עַל־ <WH5921> on יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> against Jerusalem

וַיִּוָּעַ֗ץ <WH3289> He took counsel עִם־ <WH5973> with שָׂרָיו֙ <WH8269> with his princes וְגִבֹּרָ֔יו <WH1368> and his mighty men לִסְתּוֹם֙ <WH5640> to stop אֶת־ <WH853> מֵימֵ֣י <WH4325> the waters הָעֲיָנ֔וֹת <WH5869> of the fountains אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which מִח֣וּץ <WH2351> which [were] without לָעִ֑יר <WH5892> the city וַֽיַּעְזְרֽוּהוּ׃ <WH5826> and they did help

וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <WH6908> together עַם־ <WH5971> people רָ֔ב <WH7227> much וַֽיִּסְתְּמוּ֙ <WH5640> who stopped אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמַּעְיָנ֔וֹת <WH4599> all the fountains וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנַּ֛חַל <WH5158> and the brook הַשּׁוֹטֵ֥ף <WH7857> that ran בְּתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> through the midst הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why יָב֙וֹאוּ֙ <WH935> come מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> Why should the kings אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria וּמָצְא֖וּ <WH4672> and find מַ֥יִם <WH4325> waste רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> much

וַיִּתְחַזַּ֡ק <WH2388> Also he strengthened וַיִּבֶן֩ <WH1129> himself and built up אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַחוֹמָ֨ה <WH2346> all the wall הַפְּרוּצָ֜ה <WH6555> that was broken וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> and raised [it] up עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמִּגְדָּל֗וֹת <WH4026> to the towers וְלַח֙וּצָה֙ <WH2351> without הַחוֹמָ֣ה <WH2346> wall אַחֶ֔רֶת <WH312> and another וַיְחַזֵּ֥ק <WH2388> and repaired אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּלּ֖וֹא <WH4407> Millo עִ֣יר <WH5892> [in] the city דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> of David וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> and made שֶׁ֛לַח <WH7973> darts לָרֹ֖ב <WH7230> in abundance וּמָגִנִּֽים׃ <WH4043> and shields

וַיִּתֵּ֛ן <WH5414> And he set שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> captains מִלְחָמ֖וֹת <WH4421> of war עַל־ <WH5921> over הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> over the people וַיִּקְבְּצֵ֣ם <WH6908> and gathered them together אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about אֶל־ <WH413> to רְחוֹב֙ <WH7339> to him in the street שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> of the gate הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> and spake עַל־ <WH5921> over לְבָבָ֖ם <WH3824> comfortably לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> to them saying

חִזְק֣וּ <WH2388> Be strong וְאִמְצ֔וּ <WH553> and courageous אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְא֣וּ <WH3372> be not afraid וְאַל־ <WH408> not תֵּחַ֗תּוּ <WH2865> nor dismayed מִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> for מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria וּמִלִּפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> accept כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הֶהָמ֣וֹן <WH1995> nor for all the multitude אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> with כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עִמָּ֥נוּ <WH5973> with רַ֖ב <WH7227> that [is] with him for [there be] more מֵעִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with

עִמּוֹ֙ <WH5973> with זְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> With him [is] an arm בָּשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> of flesh וְעִמָּ֜נוּ <WH5973> with יְהוָ֤ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> our God לְעָזְרֵ֔נוּ <WH5826> to help וּלְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> us and to fight מִלְחֲמֹתֵ֑נוּ <WH4421> our battles וַיִּסָּמְכ֣וּ <WH5564> rested הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> And the people עַל־ <WH5921> on דִּבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> themselves upon the words יְחִזְקִיָּ֥הוּ <WH2396> of Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah פ

אַ֣חַר <WH310> After זֶ֗ה <WH2088> this שָׁ֠לַח <WH7971> send סַנְחֵרִ֨יב <WH5576> this did Sennacherib מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king אַשּׁ֤וּר <WH804> of Assyria עֲבָדָיו֙ <WH5650> his servants יְר֣וּשָׁלַ֔יְמָה <WH3389> to Jerusalem וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he עַל־ <WH5921> he besieging לָכִ֔ישׁ <WH3923> (but he [himself laid siege] against Lachish וְכָל־ <WH3605> all מֶמְשַׁלְתּ֖וֹ <WH4475> and all his power עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> with עַל־ <WH5921> against יְחִזְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH2396> Hezekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וְעַל־ <WH5921> and against כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> and unto all Judah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> that [were] at Jerusalem לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֔ר <WH559> Thus saith סַנְחֵרִ֖יב <WH5576> Sennacherib מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> of Assyria עַל־ <WH5921> on מָה֙ <WH4100> what אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> are you בֹּטְחִ֔ים <WH982> Whereon do ye trust וְיֹשְׁבִ֥ים <WH3427> that ye abide בְּמָצ֖וֹר <WH4692> in the siege בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> Jerusalem

הֲלֹ֤א <WH3808> is not יְחִזְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH2396> Hezekiah מַסִּ֣ית <WH5496> persuade אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> לָתֵ֣ת <WH5414> you to give אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> לָמ֛וּת <WH4191> over yourselves to die בְּרָעָ֥ב <WH7458> by famine וּבְצָמָ֖א <WH6772> and by thirst לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God יַצִּילֵ֕נוּ <WH5337> shall deliver מִכַּ֖ף <WH3709> us out of the hand מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <WH804> Asshur

הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> has not הוּא֙ <WH1931> the same יְחִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah הֵסִ֥יר <WH5493> taken away אֶת־ <WH853> בָּמֹתָ֖יו <WH1116> his high places וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבְּחֹתָ֑יו <WH4196> and his altars וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> and commanded לִֽיהוּדָ֤ה <WH3063> Judah וְלִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> and Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> before מִזְבֵּ֧חַ <WH4196> altar אֶחָ֛ד <WH259> one תִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <WH7812> Ye shall worship וְעָלָ֥יו <WH5921> and תַּקְטִֽירוּ׃ <WH6999> and burn incense

הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> not תֵדְע֗וּ <WH3045> Know מֶ֤ה <WH4100> what עָשִׂ֙יתִי֙ <WH6213> have done אֲנִ֣י <WH589> and וַאֲבוֹתַ֔י <WH1> ye not what I and my fathers לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all עַמֵּ֣י <WH5971> unto all the people הָאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> of those lands הֲיָכ֣וֹל <WH3605> to all יָֽכְל֗וּ <WH3201> any ways אֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> angels גּוֹיֵ֣ <WH1471> of the nations הָאֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> their lands לְהַצִּ֥יל <WH5337> to deliver אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצָ֖ם <WH776> their land מִיָּדִֽי׃ <WH3027> able

מִ֠י <WH4310> Who בְּֽכָל־ <WH3605> all אֱלֹהֵ֞י <WH430> Who [was there] among all the gods הַגּוֹיִ֤ם <WH1471> of those nations הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> of those אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הֶחֱרִ֣ימוּ <WH2763> utterly destroyed אֲבוֹתַ֔י <WH1> that my fathers אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who יָכ֔וֹל <WH3201> that could לְהַצִּ֥יל <WH5337> deliver אֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> his people מִיָּדִ֑י <WH3027> out of mine hand כִּ֤י <WH3588> for יוּכַל֙ <WH3201> should be able אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> that your God לְהַצִּ֥יל <WH5337> to deliver אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מִיָּדִֽי׃ <WH3027> of my hand

וְעַתָּ֡ה <WH6258> Now אַל־ <WH408> nay יַשִּׁיא֩ <WH5377> deceive אֶתְכֶ֨ם <WH853> חִזְקִיָּ֜הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah וְאַל־ <WH408> or יַסִּ֨ית <WH5496> you nor persuade אֶתְכֶ֣ם <WH853> כָּזֹאת֮ <WH2063> and do וְאַל־ <WH408> not תַּאֲמִ֣ינוּ <WH539> you on this manner neither yet believe לוֹ֒ כִּי־ <WH3588> let לֹ֣א <WH3808> Now therefore let not יוּכַ֗ל <WH3201> was able כָּל־ <WH3605> of any אֱל֙וֹהַ֙ <WH433> him for no god כָּל־ <WH3605> of any גּ֣וֹי <WH1471> of any nation וּמַמְלָכָ֔ה <WH4467> or kingdom לְהַצִּ֥יל <WH5337> to deliver עַמּ֛וֹ <WH5971> his people מִיָּדִ֖י <WH3027> out of mine hand וּמִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> and out of the hand אֲבוֹתָ֑י <WH1> of my fathers אַ֚ף <WH637> How כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֱ‍ֽלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> how much less shall your God לֹא־ <WH3808> not יַצִּ֥ילוּ <WH5337> deliver אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מִיָּדִֽי׃ <WH3027> the hand

וְעוֹד֙ <WH5750> further דִּבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> spake עֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> And his servants עַל־ <WH5921> against יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> yet [more] against the LORD הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and against יְחִזְקִיָּ֥הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah עַבְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH5650> and against his servant

וּסְפָרִ֣ים <WH5612> also letters כָּתַ֔ב <WH3789> He wrote לְחָרֵ֕ף <WH2778> to rail לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> on the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלֵֽאמֹ֨ר <WH559> and to speak עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> against לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> against him saying כֵּֽאלֹהֵ֞י <WH430> As the gods גּוֹיֵ֤ <WH1471> of the nations הָאֲרָצוֹת֙ <WH776> of [other] lands אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> have not הִצִּ֤ילוּ <WH5337> have not delivered עַמָּם֙ <WH5971> their people מִיָּדִ֔י <WH3027> out of mine hand כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יַצִּ֞יל <WH5337> deliver אֱלֹהֵ֧י <WH430> so shall not the God יְחִזְקִיָּ֛הוּ <WH2396> of Hezekiah עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> his people מִיָּדִֽי׃ <WH3027> out of mine hand

וַיִּקְרְא֨וּ <WH7121> Then they cried בְקוֹל־ <WH6963> voice גָּד֜וֹל <WH1419> with a loud יְהוּדִ֗ית <WH3066> in the Jews' speech עַל־ <WH5921> unto עַ֤ם <WH5971> unto the people יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> of Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> were on הַֽחוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> that [were] on the wall לְיָֽרְאָ֖ם <WH3372> to affright וּֽלְבַהֲלָ֑ם <WH926> them and to trouble לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> so יִלְכְּד֥וּ <WH3920> them that they might take אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> the city

וַֽיְדַבְּר֔וּ <WH1696> And they spake אֶל־ <WH413> of אֱלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> the God יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem כְּעַ֗ל <WH5921> against אֱלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> as against the gods עַמֵּ֣י <WH5971> of the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> [which were] the work יְדֵ֥י <WH3027> of the hands הָאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of man ס

וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֞ל <WH6419> prayed יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וִֽישַֽׁעְיָ֧הוּ <WH3470> Isaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָמ֛וֹץ <WH531> of Amoz הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> and the prophet עַל־ <WH5921> about זֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise וַֽיִּזְעֲק֖וּ <WH2199> and cried הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> to heaven פ
